bioghist.head: Biography
bioghist.p: Anthony Frederick Sarg was born 24 April 1882 in Guatemala. He came to the United States in 1915 and was naturalized in 1921. He died 7 March 1942 in New York City.

p.emph: Source: Yesterday's Authors of Books for Children, pp. 233-237.
